attributes.description:
The noted price is for a cash purchase however we do offer finance through all banks including IEMAS and Investec. The finance price will be an additional R20 000. This vehicle has accident history however repaired as seen on images. Cash Price Noted Above, Dekra inspection (condition and diagnosis report) of R1756 will be done at your own cost.

Please note that our cash deals do not include VAT. We charge an additional admin fee of R3500 for license and registration, fuel and temp permit (if required).

Trading Hours: 8AM to 5PM (Mon-Fri); 8AM to 3PM (Sat & Public Holidays)

We accept cash, and fully paid up trade-ins. 

Book your viewing and test drive today with our sales team's.

attributes.description: All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and an EXSTRA quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our KIA N1 Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit you needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you here on our safe and spacious showroom. Contact the Kia Konfidence N1 TEAM NOW!
